column4: You do not have the permissions necessary to save the file. Please check that you typed the location correctly and try again.
how to set the permission in ubuntu

either you can use sth like gksu gedit >pythonfile<  or use chmod or chown to change ownwership of the file

though you can change the ownership to save the file, its not a good idea to have normal user access to confi-files
but I should modify the existing file to execute django project
then use gedit/kate/nano- whatever as superuser, also see :
